alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 1:13PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Indian River, southwestern Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Marian, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kenansville and Lake Marian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard
